name: Actions on officers' salaries
text: §431:4-316  Actions on officers' salaries.  No action to recover, or no action on account of, any salary or other compensation due or claimed to be due any officer or director of a domestic mutual insurer, or on any note or agreement relative thereto, shall be brought against the insurer later than twelve months after the date on which the salary or compensation, or any installment thereof, first accrued. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
